transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan kaun hai?
Executive: Ji good evening sir, Ilma baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji actually aapka ek hamare paas mail aaya tha ki abhi aapko inquiries nahi aa rahi IndiaMART se suspended related machinery mein aur ji bar bending bar bending mein bar cutting mein to abhi kya problem aa rahi hai sir? Last time baat hui thi to us time kuch by leads pe humne discuss kiya tha to abhi kya aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Discuss kiya hai wahi problem hai na madam wo solve hi nahi hua.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: [inaudible] wahi problem hai wo.
Executive: Sir aapki aawaz mujhe nahi aa rahi hai properly.
Customer: Last time aapne bola tha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: [inaudible] karke lead uthane ko.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji sir last time aap se baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to usme maine aapko bola tha lead search karke uthane ko.
Customer: Search karne ke baad wo aa hi nahi rahe.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Search karne ke baad aa hi nahi rahe wo notification aata hai okay notification aake wo lead expire bhi ho jata hai hum din bhar bhi search karoge tabhi wo record [unintelligible].
Executive: Sir aapki aawaz mujhe nahi aa rahi properly.
Customer: Are aap kaise aapke ekdam proper aa raha hai madam aapko mera kaise nahi aa raha hai?
Executive: Mujhe aapki properly nahi aa rahi hai sir aap mujhe bataiyega ab aap kya keh rahe hain ki aapne by lead search karke dekha but by lead nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Nahi aa rahi hai wo wo by lead ko nahi rakhna hai mujhe.
Executive: Achcha. Okay.
Executive: Ek second sir.
Executive: Main check kar le rahi hu.
Executive: Aap roz search karte hai leads ko sir uski?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha aur roz aap check kar rahe hai aapko ek bhi lead nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Haan wo bar bending mein lead aata hi nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Ek second sir. Dekh rahi hu sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Haan kar. Haan.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir yaha pe main bar bending machine ke liye jo aapka product hai.
Customer: Haan kya problem?
Executive: Haan keh rahi hu jo bar bending machine ka aapka product hai na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uski main check kar rahi hu aapki lead ki wo leads available hai ki nahi hai aap waise isko pan India basis pe hi karte honge na sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi karte hai hum deal only Maharashtra mein karte hai hum.
Executive: Achcha only Maharashtra. To ek aapko bar bending machine ki achcha theek hai bar aapki aayi hai bar bending machine spare parts ki door section bending machine bar bending and bar cutting machine spare parts aluminium window mirror frame bending machine automatic.
Customer: Window bending pipe bending usme koi hamare paas machine hi nahi hai bar bending.
Executive: Achcha aur aapko sirf specifically Maharashtra se hi chahiye aur kahin se nahi chahiye.
Customer: Haan correct.
Executive: Achcha okay.
Customer: Specifically Pune, Solapur.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Latur nearby location se hi chahiye.
Executive: Haan haan main samajh rahi hu aapko chahiye. Aur uske alawa kis product mein chahiye sir?
Customer: Ab bar bending bar cutting suspended platform ye teeno ko activate kar dijiye abhi filhaal.
Executive: Achcha. Theek hai ek baar main check kar leti hu aur aapse ek baar sir subah mein discuss karti hu is cheez ke liye.
Executive: Ek baar sari check karke aapko whatsapp karti hu main check karti hu aur aapko share karti hu agar iski lead aayi hai aur phir aapse ek baar kal subah video meet kar sakte hai sir kal subah?
Customer: Are yaar madam ji last time bhi kiya hai abhi video meet karne ki matlab kya karke kya karenge?
Executive: Sir nahi isliye main bas bol rahi thi ki ek baar sir usme nahi change nahi karne ke liye usme bas aapko aap mere ko boliye kya problem hai boliye office mein baat karke. Sir main by lead ke liye keh rahi thi.
Executive: Theek hai main ek baar check karke aapke liye aapke product mein aapko whatsapp kar do aap mujhe product ka bata dijiye main aapko by lead share karti hu uska aur aapse ek baar discuss karti hu subah mein.
Customer: Minimum mujhe lagta hai 10 logo ko to maine complaint diya hai abhi abhi seriously aapne bola.
Executive: Nahi aapka ye resolve hoke aayega sir resolve hoke aapko main bataungi subah mein.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bilkul okay sir main apni puri koshish karungi ki aapka resolve kar du is problem ko.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai theek hai okay.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries for bar bending machine.

- Wants leads specifically from Maharashtra.

- Wants bar bending, bar cutting, suspended platform activated.



Resolution:

- Executive checked for leads for bar bending machine.

- Agreed to check and share leads via WhatsApp.

- Agreed to discuss the issue in the morning.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share leads via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, maharashtra, bar bending, product activation
